title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1085.10 - Animals barred from terminal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1085.10 - Animals barred from terminal

State Regulations

No person except a police officer or other person
authorized by Metro-North shall enter a terminal, station or train with any
animal except a seeing eye or hearing ear dog or an animal enroute to or from a
train and under the direct control of the individual the animal is accompanying
such as by leash, container or other device. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1085.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
